entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Savant Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 02:47 AM CST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 22.
